description:
Functional and practical, pull on this sun hat for coverage in the summer heat. The wide brim gives you ample shading and is foam stiffened to keep it afloat in case of an unexpected dip.

  • Woven recycled nylon has UPF 50+ sun protection and a rain shedding DWR finish
  • Mesh lining vents heat
  • Soft recycled polyester sweatband keep sweat out of your eyes
  • Foam-stiffened brim floats and holds its shape
  • Adjustable shockcord in headband to get the fit just right
  • Chin cord has an adjustable cord lock for a secure fit
name: MEC Hideaway Sun Hat - Unisex
